errorMessage: An Specific Resource body cannot include a source key. source key is only valid with Specific Resources.
title: If an **Specific Resource Body** is a body, it does not have a **_source_ key** - [model 4](https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/#specific-resources)
description: True when no Specific Resource bodies or when none of the Specific Resource bodies include the source key. (Section 4)
